title: Cardano Canvas, Cards & Calculator
description: Hubs needing to run events to develop local Cardano knowledge lack frameworks and tools based on shared global patterns and language.
solution: Create Canvas, Card deck & Calculator tools to design blockchain ventures at hub events that are easy to explain, customise & share offline
experience: Co-founded nationwide place-based network of local hubs running events for entrepreneurs; Blockchain, Finance, Design, Startups, Education
